title: VR-Based Deep Learning of Mathematical Concepts: Virtual Reality-Supported Training for Working Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary calculus and linear algebra knowledge, basic VR device operation skills
context.additional_context: Implementation of smartphone-based VR environments, 3D-modeled math concept simulations, and asynchronous collaborative learning spaces

learning_goals: Manipulate graphical representations of functions in a 3D virtual space to explain core calculus concepts.
Perform multi-coordinate system transformations in a VR environment and analyze the geometric meaning of linear transformations.
Design statistical distribution simulations using virtual laboratory tools and derive analytical results.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
